description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1b. Physical description: 21-23 lines per page; written in casual naskh and shikastah in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords. A few repairs and occasional smudging. Origin: 11 Rabīʻ II 1262 H [8 April 1846] (leaf 162b). Incipit: اللهم اني احمدك ... وبعد فان الالتفات
author: Aʻraj, ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Muḥammad, 1282-1353?
abstract: First part of a commentary on Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillīʼs Tahdhīb al-wuṣūl ilá ʻilm al-uṣūl.
alternative: كتاب منية اللبيب في شرح التهذيب
extent: 162 leaves : paper ; 207 x 145 (148-165 x 98) mm bound to 212 x 150 mm
title: Hādhā Kitāb Munyat al-labīb fī sharḥ al-Tahdhīb
uniform_title: منية اللبيب في شرح التهذيب. جزء 1
creator: اعرج، عبد المطلب بن محمد، 1282-1353?
subject: Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī, al-Ḥasan ibn Yūsuf, 1250-1325—Tahdhīb al-wuṣūl ilá ʻilm al-uṣūl.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
